participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: empathetic and nurturing, with a penchant for the macabre.
participant_1.background: horror movies are my favorites. i've a son who is in junior high school. my father used to work for home depot. i spent a decade working in the human services field.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: ambitious and caring, always seeking to improve himself and help others.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
